content.question: Which of the following can replace /* missing code */ to produce this result?

choices.label: int initialSize = myList.size(); for (int i = 0; i < initialSize; i++) { myList.add(2, myList.remove(0)); yourList.add(myList.get(0)); }
int initialSize = myList.size(); for (int i = 1; i <= initialSize; i++) { yourList.add(myList.get(i)); }
for (Integer temp : myList) { myList.add(2, myList.remove(0)); yourList.add(temp); }

content.answer: int initialSize = myList.size(); for (int i = 0; i < initialSize; i++) { myList.add(2, myList.remove(0)); yourList.add(myList.get(0)); }

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
